languages.text: "Еды ровно столько, чтобы отсек не голодал, Лорд-капитан. Поэтому блюстители следят, чтобы на руках у серфа не было талонов больше положенного. Раньше за такое рвали язык, но я смягчил наказание до побоев и конфискации всех талонов. Изъятое приказано выдавать тем рабочим, которые голодают из-за нехватки вахт — это немного, но лучше, чем ничего". {n}Капитан угрюмо хмыкает.{/n} "Присваивают ли некоторые блюстители конфискат? Да. Получают ли уличенные в краже суровую кару? Однозначно".

traits.locale_text: "Еды ровно столько, чтобы отсек не голодал, Лорд-капитан. Поэтому блюстители следят, чтобы на руках у серфа не было талонов больше положенного. Раньше за такое рвали язык, но я смягчил наказание до побоев и конфискации всех талонов. Изъятое приказано выдавать тем рабочим, которые голодают из-за нехватки вахт — это немного, но лучше, чем ничего". {n}Капитан угрюмо хмыкает.{/n} "Присваивают ли некоторые блюстители конфискат? Да. Получают ли уличенные в краже суровую кару? Однозначно".

languages.text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."
languages.original_text: "Еды ровно столько, чтобы отсек не голодал, Лорд-капитан. Поэтому блюстители следят, чтобы на руках у серфа не было талонов больше положенного. Раньше за такое рвали язык, но я смягчил наказание до побоев и конфискации всех талонов. Изъятое приказано выдавать тем рабочим, которые голодают из-за нехватки вахт — это немного, но лучше, чем ничего". {n}Капитан угрюмо хмыкает.{/n} "Присваивают ли некоторые блюстители конфискат? Да. Получают ли уличенные в краже суровую кару? Однозначно".

traits.locale_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to beating the thief and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

{n}The captain's eyelid is twitching.{/n} "Negative, Lord Captain! We only follow the established procedure. Larceny entails compensation as well as punitive damages. The previous captain had tool thieves' arms chopped off, and ration thieves' tongues ripped out. I, on the other hand, am convinced that hard labour can turn the basest of brutes into a faithful servant of His. And that's why my lads and gals are merciful."

"The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

{n}The captain's eyelid twitches.{/n} "Negative, Lord Captain! We are merely following established procedure. The penalty for larceny is compensation as well as punitive damages. The previous captain would cut off arms for stealing tools, or rip out tongues for stealing rations. However, I am convinced that hard labour can turn the basest of brutes into faithful servants of Him. And that's why my enforcers show mercy."

Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

languages.text: «El compartimento recibe la comida justa para no morirse de inanición, Lord Capitán. Por eso los guardias se aseguran de que ningún siervo acapare más tarjetas de las que le corresponden. Antes se les castigaba arrancándoles la lengua, pero reduje el castigo a una buena tunda y la incautación de todas las tarjetas. Tenemos órdenes de repartir esas tarjetas a los trabajadores que pasan hambre por no disponer de empleo; no es que les sirvan de mucho, pero menos da una piedra». {n}Frensoe resopla.{/n} «¿Hay guardias que se quedan los artículos confiscados? Sí. ¿Se castiga con severidad a los que pillamos haciéndolo? Por descontado».
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

traits.locale_text: «El compartimento recibe la comida justa para no morirse de inanición, Lord Capitán. Por eso los guardias se aseguran de que ningún siervo acapare más tarjetas de las que le corresponden. Antes se les castigaba arrancándoles la lengua, pero reduje el castigo a una buena tunda y la incautación de todas las tarjetas. Tenemos órdenes de repartir esas tarjetas a los trabajadores que pasan hambre por no disponer de empleo; no es que les sirvan de mucho, pero menos da una piedra». {n}Frensoe resopla.{/n} «¿Hay guardias que se quedan los artículos confiscados? Sí. ¿Se castiga con severidad a los que pillamos haciéndolo? Por descontado».

{n}El ojo del capitán se crispa.{/n} «¡Negativo, Lord Capitán! Solo estamos siguiendo el procedimiento establecido. La pena por hurto mayor incluye compensación, además de daños y perjuicios. El anterior capitán cortaba brazos por robar herramientas y lenguas por robar raciones. En cambio, yo estoy convencido de que el trabajo duro puede convertir incluso a los bárbaros más salvajes en fieles sirvientes Suyos. Por eso mis guardias son piadosos».

languages.text: 「この区画には、飢えをしのぐのに十分なだけの食料がありますよ、大尉殿。そのためエンフォーサーは、農奴が想定以上のカードを持たせないようにしているのです。かつてはそれで舌を抜かれたこともありましたが、今では罰則を減らし、泥棒を殴ってカードを全部没収するだけにしました。命令は、勤務シフトが足りなくて飢えている労働者に、このカードを渡すようにというものです。大して役には立ちませんが、何もしないよりはマシでしょう」{n}フレンソーが嘲笑する。{/n}「押収品を横領したエンフォーサーは罪に問われますか？はい。盗みを働いた者は厳しい罰を受けますか？当然です」
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

traits.locale_text: 「この区画には、飢えをしのぐのに十分なだけの食料がありますよ、大尉殿。そのためエンフォーサーは、農奴が想定以上のカードを持たせないようにしているのです。かつてはそれで舌を抜かれたこともありましたが、今では罰則を減らし、泥棒を殴ってカードを全部没収するだけにしました。命令は、勤務シフトが足りなくて飢えている労働者に、このカードを渡すようにというものです。大して役には立ちませんが、何もしないよりはマシでしょう」{n}フレンソーが嘲笑する。{/n}「押収品を横領したエンフォーサーは罪に問われますか？はい。盗みを働いた者は厳しい罰を受けますか？当然です」

{n}中隊長のまぶたがピクピクと動く。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン！私たちは、定められた手順に従っているだけにすぎません。窃盗の罰則は賠償金と懲罰的損害賠償です。以前の中隊長は、道具を盗んだものの腕を切り落としたり、配給を盗んだ者の舌を引きちぎったりしていました。ですが、私は、過酷な労働が野蛮な連中を主の忠実な下僕に変えられると確信しております。ですからこそ、私のエンフォーサーは慈悲を見せるのです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，这片甲板的食物配给很充足，不至于把人饿死，所以执法者才要严格控制那些船员手里的配给卡数量，确保他们没有不该有的配给卡。之前，要是执法者看到有人拿了不该拿的配给卡，他们会把那些人的舌头割掉，但我不会那么严厉。我只会揍那些小偷一顿，把他们的配给卡统统没收，分给那些没活干挨饿的工人。这样的措施其实没什么太大用处，但总比没有好。”{n}弗伦索哼了一声。{/n}“会不会有执法者偷偷挪用被没收的东西？确实会有。要是我们发现了这种事情，会不会严厉惩处那些违规分子？肯定会。”
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这片甲板的食物配给很充足，不至于把人饿死，所以执法者才要严格控制那些船员手里的配给卡数量，确保他们没有不该有的配给卡。之前，要是执法者看到有人拿了不该拿的配给卡，他们会把那些人的舌头割掉，但我不会那么严厉。我只会揍那些小偷一顿，把他们的配给卡统统没收，分给那些没活干挨饿的工人。这样的措施其实没什么太大用处，但总比没有好。”{n}弗伦索哼了一声。{/n}“会不会有执法者偷偷挪用被没收的东西？确实会有。要是我们发现了这种事情，会不会严厉惩处那些违规分子？肯定会。”
{n}弗伦索队长眼皮抽搐了一下。{/n}“并非如此，舰长大人！我们只是在遵循既定程序行事。若是有人犯下了盗窃罪，罪犯不仅需要赔偿，还要受到额外的惩罚。若是换做前任队长，要是他发现有人盗窃工具，他会砍掉罪犯的胳膊，如果有人盗窃口粮，他就会扯掉罪犯的舌头。不过我坚信，艰苦的劳作可以将最卑劣的牲畜变为神皇忠实的仆人。正因如此，我的手下会更加仁慈。”

languages.text: "Das Modul hat gerade genug Lebensmittel, damit niemand verhungert, Lord Captain. Deshalb sorgen die Enforcer dafür, dass niemand mehr Karten hat, als er haben sollte. Früher haben sie den Leuten dafür die Zunge abgeschnitten, aber ich habe das Strafmaß auf eine ordentliche Tracht Prügel und die Konfiszierung aller ihrer Karten reduziert. Der Befehl lautet, diese Karten Arbeitern zu geben, die aufgrund mangelnder Arbeitsschichten hungern ... nicht dass ihnen das groß helfen würde, aber es ist besser als nichts." {n}Frensoe verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Gibt es Enforcer, die die konfiszierten Objekte unterschlagen? Ja. Werden gefasste Diebe hart bestraft? Absolut."
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

traits.locale_text: "Das Modul hat gerade genug Lebensmittel, damit niemand verhungert, Lord Captain. Deshalb sorgen die Enforcer dafür, dass niemand mehr Karten hat, als er haben sollte. Früher haben sie den Leuten dafür die Zunge abgeschnitten, aber ich habe das Strafmaß auf eine ordentliche Tracht Prügel und die Konfiszierung aller ihrer Karten reduziert. Der Befehl lautet, diese Karten Arbeitern zu geben, die aufgrund mangelnder Arbeitsschichten hungern ... nicht dass ihnen das groß helfen würde, aber es ist besser als nichts." {n}Frensoe verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Gibt es Enforcer, die die konfiszierten Objekte unterschlagen? Ja. Werden gefasste Diebe hart bestraft? Absolut."

{n}Die Augenlider des Captains zucken.{/n} "Negativ, Lord Captain! Wir folgen lediglich dem etablierten Ablauf. Die Strafe für Diebstahl lautet Entschädigung plus Buße. Der vorherige Captain hat für den Diebstahl von Werkzeugen Arme abhacken und für Rationen Zungen herausreißen lassen. Ich hingegen bin überzeugt, dass harte Arbeit auch den simpelsten Rohling in treue Diener von Ihm verwandelt. Und deshalb zeigen meine Enforcers Nachsicht."

languages.text: « Le compartiment a juste ce qu'il faut de nourriture pour éviter que ses occupants meurent de faim, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, raison pour laquelle les prévôts veillent à ce qu'aucun serf n'ait plus de tickets de rationnement que prévu. Avant, les voleurs avaient la langue arrachée, mais j'ai allégé leur châtiment et ils reçoivent désormais une simple correction, assortie de la confiscation de tous leurs tickets. Nous les redistribuons ensuite aux ouvriers qui n'arrivent pas à se nourrir correctement par manque de travail... non pas que ça les aide beaucoup, mais c'est toujours mieux que rien. » {n}Frensoe s'esclaffe.{/n} « Les prévôts sont-ils coupables de détourner les objets confisqués ? Oui. Les voleurs pris la main dans le sac sont-ils sévèrement punis ? Absolument. »
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."

traits.locale_text: « Le compartiment a juste ce qu'il faut de nourriture pour éviter que ses occupants meurent de faim, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, raison pour laquelle les prévôts veillent à ce qu'aucun serf n'ait plus de tickets de rationnement que prévu. Avant, les voleurs avaient la langue arrachée, mais j'ai allégé leur châtiment et ils reçoivent désormais une simple correction, assortie de la confiscation de tous leurs tickets. Nous les redistribuons ensuite aux ouvriers qui n'arrivent pas à se nourrir correctement par manque de travail... non pas que ça les aide beaucoup, mais c'est toujours mieux que rien. » {n}Frensoe s'esclaffe.{/n} « Les prévôts sont-ils coupables de détourner les objets confisqués ? Oui. Les voleurs pris la main dans le sac sont-ils sévèrement punis ? Absolument. »

{n}La paupière du capitaine tressaute.{/n} « Négatif, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure. Nous ne faisons que réclamer des compensations et dommages et intérêts pour leurs larcins. L'ancien capitaine faisait couper les bras de ceux qui osaient voler des outils, ou arracher la langue des voleurs de rations. Je suis pour ma part convaincu que le travail acharné peut transformer la plus vile des brutes en fidèle serviteur. C'est pourquoi mes hommes font preuve d'autant de miséricorde. »

languages.text: "Kompartımanda bizi anca açlıktan ölmekten koruyacak kadar yiyecek var Lord Kaptan. Bu nedenle infazcılar, hiçbir kölenin hak ettiğinden fazla karta sahip olmaması için uğraşıyor. Eskiden böyle hususlarda insanların dillerini koparırlardı ama cezaları azalttım. Artık hırsızları dövüp tüm kartlarına el koyuyoruz. Bu kartları vardiya yetersizliğinden dolayı aç kalan işçilere vermemiz emrediliyor. Onlara çok yararı dokunmasa da hiç yoktan iyidir." {n}Frensoe dudaklarını büküyor.{/n} "Bu infazcılar, el koyulan eşyaları haksız yere almaktan suçlu mu? Evet. Çalarken yakalananlar, ağır cezalara çarptırılıyor mu? Kesinlikle."
languages.original_text: "The compartment has just enough food to avoid starvation, Lord Captain. This is why the enforcers are making sure that no serf has more cards than they're supposed to. They used to rip out people's tongues for it, but I reduced the punishment to simply beating the thieves and confiscating all their cards. The orders are to give these cards to workers who are starving due to a lack of work shifts — not that it helps them much, but it's better than nothing." {n}Frensoe scoffs.{/n} "Are there enforcers guilty of misappropriating the confiscated items? Yes. Do those caught stealing receive severe punishment? Absolutely."
